# lifesaveR: Workbook 2

This R Markdown document is your workbook for session two of the lifesaveR module.

## Variables

This chunk runs the calculation `40 + 2`, assigns the result to the variable `meaningoflife`, and then prints the value
of the variable.

```{r life}
meaningoflife <- 40 + 2
meaningoflife
```
